subject: Re: inplants, this is scary stuff, people. Gimme a Break Snowfire!
author: Fiona Broome
full_text:
Hi,

I'm generally in lurk mode due to some offline priorities that need my immediate attention.  I'll probably be fairly silent through mid-July, but I had to speak up when this email crossed my desk.

While I don't share Snowfire's views in most cases, I've always enjoyed the links & banter.  The recordings are always interesting... and isn't that the focus of this group?

I'm not thrilled with ultimatums, as if the group isn't big enough (or big-hearted enough) to include diverse views, respectfully shared.

My two cents: Snowfire, please don't leave!

In haste,
Fiona

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, SnowfireL@... wrote:
>
> I mean the stuff below, if you are so bothered by opinion, Billy?  I  will 
> leave, but the stuff in that statement below of yours, is very out of  
> context, to each is own.  I was merely presenting something I came across  on the 
> You Tube, I don't even know that person. Take care, sf
